title: TEAM PANDAMONIUM TRIALS
body:
WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF TRIALLING PLAYERS AND SEEKING COACH.

WE CURRENTLY HAVE 2 TEAMS;
PANDAMONIUM BLACK (challenger/mix)
PANDAMONIUM WHITE (challenger)

WHITE HAS BEEN FILLED AND ARE CURRENTLY NOT LOOKING FOR PLAYERS.

BLACK IS LOOKING FOR PLAYERS, ADC, MID, TOP.

Due to the number of people approaching us last time I can’t guarantee callbacks for everyone but I’ll do my best as you all deserve feedback.

If you wish to apply please send me your IGN and if you’re applying for the coaching position please send me your resume and/or explain what you would bring to this organisation.

Anthony.volkii@pandaesports.net

We look after our players and offer the world and as much support needed to see you grow and reach your goals.. I won’t talk about payments etc on forums but for the right people arrangements will be made to make sure our organisation is giving something back for your effort and dedication.

All the best everyone!!

Volkiiii

replies.body:
Hey, I know this is a very late reply, but I'm looking to join a competitive team. 

I'm a Master ADC player and if it's still possible I would like to try out for the ADC position for Pandamonium Black.

I've added you on League Volkiiii (my IGN is PIuto) so if you wanna continue the conversation just accept the request and we can talk there.

Cheers.
Im plat 5, and im interested and dedicated to learn as a team. Even though im a bit lower in rank I really want to join
